messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'props'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [props]

messages.message: Using target="_blank" without rel="noreferrer" is a security risk: see https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/links.html#link-type-noopener
